job.title: zOS RACF Programmer*
job.description: The Opportunity: VSO is seeking a zOS logical security programmer to provide logical security support on an existing zOS environment with 3-5 years experience with RACF, CA-ACF2, CA-TopSecret, Global Security Settings, SSL and Digital Certificate, risk assessment. As part of the VSO company, you will be part of a virtue-centered team who value their work and teammates. . We provide ongoing learning and development opportunities to foster continuous growth. We offer competitive salaries, health benefits, and flexible work arrangements. : VSO is a hybrid cloud and managed services consulting firm.
